nodes.title: Update of parent POM to 44 and license:format
Update of parent POM to 43 and license:format
Fix IllegalStateException with no message when line number > 999, fixes #30
Fix report when primary and secondary location have the same range, fixes #28
Update travis-utils from v37 to v38
Support several messages on the same line regardless of the occurrence order.
Support several Noncompliant@<line> referencing the same line, fixes #22
Transform the test-commons API in two main interfaces SingleFileVerifier and MultiFileVerifier
Transform the test-commons API in two main interfaces SingleFileVerifier and MultiFileVerifier
Make tabulation visible in the report
Add effortToFix, Support newline character in comment, Add comment for column/endColumn
Create SonarQube Analyzer Test Commons using "sonar-rule-unit-test" from TSQL
Call NewRule.setActivatedByDefault based on default profile
Move regex visitors from analyzer to commons
Move persistent collections classes from sonar-java to analyzer-commons
Add file provider based on path pattern
Import Regex helper classes from sonar-java
BUILD-909 Update to release pipeline v3
Renew repox accounts and signing key
Add sonar-regex-parsing.jar to the list of jar to publish
SONARJAVA-3732 Execute the move of the regex parser into analyzer-commons
Update to parent pom 55 and update license headers
[xml-parsing] Create a XPathBuilder to support namespaces in xpath
Fix bug related to XML attributes order and locations
Avoid NPE when encountering empty CDATA
Add status badges to the project
Fix quality flaw: general pass to fix open issues
Uniform module names and other minor fixes
Split SafetyFactory to avoid requiring xerces when using only stax
Comparing effortToFix should be independent of locale setting
Add annotation for addition of deprecated rule keys
fix failing tests due to not English locale (issue 98)
NPE during analysis with empty <![CDATA[]]> in XML file
Fix classloading issue in SonarLint for IntelliJ by forcing classloader
Define simple XPath based abstract check
Update XML dependencies to latest versions
Provide API to instantiate safe XML parser
SONARXML-69 handle various NewLine characters in parsing
Document limitation with comment in DTD
Add module for working with XML files
Update dependencies to build with JDK 9,10 and 11
Change message for external rule links
Use alpha release version of SQ plugin API
Add null check on security standards properties
Update version in pom.xml (should have been done before)
Interrupt thread of ProgressReport when InterruptedException
Expose severity and constantDebtMinutes from ExternalRuleLoader
Provide utility classes for external reports
Provide 'git diff' like issue report in the comparison exception message
Miletstone 1.6: Fix unit test + code smell from merge
Upgrade dependency on SonarQube to LTS 6.7
Issue#42 Replace use of deprecated RuleFinder by BuiltInQualityProfilesDefinition
Move ProgressReport from sslr-squid-bridge (changed logger and added tests)
